content.original: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads.

Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads.
content.content: 基于步兵几个世纪以来使用的武器,机甲迫击炮能够以高弧度发射一枚小炮弹落在目标上. 虽然机甲迫击炮是人类霸权发明的,但到了2835年,继承战争已将其变为历史. 随着反导系统的重新引入,工程师们重新提出了机甲迫击炮的概念. 迫击炮使用的弹药,尽管通常是有限制导包,但在测试中没有被AMS系统摧毁. 迫击炮弹的适应性也很强,可以使用多种类型弹药.

content.original: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
content.prevOriginal: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
content.content: 霹雳火导弹是为索拉里斯竟技场开发的. 与大多数导弹系统不同,霹雳火是一种能够粉碎目标的单发导弹系统. 虽然它在竟技场上很有效,但在战场上并没有得到广泛应用,因为这种单发导弹很容易受到反导系统限制. 导弹发射器虽然很小,但安装起来很难,只能安装机甲在左右侧躯干.

content.original: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.prevOriginal: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.content: 不如天琴同盟国和狼氏族推出的空对空箭导弹威力强大,这种更小的空对空导弹版本首次亮相在塔马林德公国的盟军航空部队和艾丽斯·罗塞特·马里克公爵夫人的抵抗运动.这些轻型空空导弹(LAA)体积更小、重量更轻可以由更小的战斗机携带,在大气圈中作战产生的阻力要小的多.只需要一点创造力,一个像样的机甲技师就可以将这些装置固定在机甲上作为防空措施.

I honestly don't understand what in the hells these folks are thinking sometimes. 1 SHOT! VOLATILE!

content.original: The Chain Whip was made to entangle enemy 'Mechs. Tested in the Word of Blake assault on Solaris, the first iteration used pure myomers and wasn't effective. The Blakists made it work by adding additional armor alloy chains to reinforce the myomers. This version of the Chain Whip worked well. Despite its limited damage, the Blakists found it useful for immobilizing enemy forces.

content.content: 链鞭是用来缠住敌人的机甲的.在索拉里斯上的布雷克验证测试中,第一次迭代使用了纯人工肌肉并且没有效果.布雷克之道的科学家通过添加额外的装甲合金链来加强人工肌肉使其工作.这个版本的链鞭工作得很好.尽管它的伤害有限,但布雷克之道的成员发现它对困主敌军很有效果.

content.original: The BattleMech Taser uses a specially modified metal harpoon that sends a massive electrical pulse down a wire connected to the firing unit. This electrical pulse is designed to overload the target's electrical system and hopefully cause the target unit to shut down. This allows the Taser carrying unit to capture the target rather than destroying it.

content.original: And the Lord spake, saying, 'First shalt thou take out the Holy Pin. Then, shalt thou count to three. No more. No less. Three shalt be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, nor either count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out. Once the number three, being the third number, be reached, then, lobbest thou thy Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch towards thy foe, who, being naughty in My sight, shall snuff it.'

content.original: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. 100 rounds.
content.prevOriginal: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. 100 rounds.
content.content: 中程导弹发射器(MRM)是由Luhine Amor Works的科学家设计的.MRM是死火导弹,发射的方式更像激光,而不是导弹. 为了将尽可能多的到导弹一齐发射,科学家们拆除了它们的制导系统,并使整个整个武器包更小. 尽管这被视为技术发展的一步,但廉价且致命的MRM在天龙联合体和许多雇用兵单位中传播. 100发装.

content.original: Yeah, Boss i dont know where you got this from, but this aint periphery Junk, this Rifle was Purpose Built with the best Technologies available. 10 rounds.
content.prevOriginal: Yeah, Boss i dont know where you got this from, but this aint periphery Junk, this Rifle was Purpose Built with the best Technologies available. 10 rounds.
content.content: 是的,老板,我不知道你是从那弄来的,但这不是外围太空垃圾,这把步枪是用最好的技术专门制造的. 10发装

content.original: High energy residue reduces heat efficiency by 15%.
content.prevOriginal: High energy residue reduces heat efficiency by 15%.

content.original: The Light PPC is a lighter version of the Particle Projector Cannon. Researched by the Draconis Combine, it does less damage and has shorter range than a PPC, but comes in at less than half the weight.
content.prevOriginal: The Light PPC is a lighter version of the Particle Projector Cannon. Researched by the Draconis Combine, it does less damage and has shorter range than a PPC, but comes in at less than half the weight.
content.content: 轻型粒子炮是粒子投射炮的较轻版本. 天龙联合体的眼睛表明,它的伤害较小,射程比标准PPC短,但重量不到一半.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: Made to order by Vining Engineering and Salvage Team is the 'Avenger' anything but shoddy. Built around a Mydron Rotary AC5 with specialized Shock Absorbers and a 3 ton Caseless Ammo Storage will this Howl Victory and Vengeance through the Arena. Has 120 Shots.
content.prevOriginal: Made to order by Vining Engineering and Salvage Team is the 'Avenger' anything but shoddy. Built around a Mydron Rotary AC5 with specialized Shock Absorbers and a 3 ton Caseless Ammo Storage will this Howl Victory and Vengeance through the Arena. Has 120 Shots.
content.content: 维宁工程师和打捞团队定做的'复仇者'绝不是劣质垃圾.围绕着一个专用减震器和3吨的无壳弹弹舱的迈德龙转轮AC5,这场胜利和复仇会在竞技场中呼啸而过吗. 拥有120发弹药

content.original: The Medium Rifle is the middleweight of the 'Rifle' family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle was based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra.
content.prevOriginal: The Medium Rifle is the middleweight of the 'Rifle' family. The precursor to the modern Autocannon, the Rifle was based on the main guns used by tanks on pre-spaceflight Terra.
content.content: 中型步枪是''步枪''家族中的中量级步枪. 作为现代自动炮的前身,该步枪基于太空时代前地面上坦克使用的主炮.

content.original: A Hand Held Rotary AC2. Theres a inscription on it 'This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine. My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life. My rifle, without me, is useless. Without my rifle, I am useless.'
content.prevOriginal: A Hand Held Rotary AC2. Theres a inscription on it 'This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine. My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life. My rifle, without me, is useless. Without my rifle, I am useless.'
content.content: 一个手持式转轮AC2.上面有一行铭文:''这是我的步枪.有很多这样的步枪,但这是我的.我的步枪是我最好的朋友.这是我的生活.我必须掌握它,就像我必须掌握我的生活.我的步枪没有我就没用了.没有我的步枪,我一无是处.''

content.original: A Hand Held Jury rigged Rotary AC2
content.prevOriginal: A Hand Held Jury rigged Rotary AC2

content.original: Basically this is a Vehicle Mortar, Boss. Some Junker wired it up to be Held by a Battlemech and to fire home made 'Grenades'. 10 Shots.
content.prevOriginal: Basically this is a Vehicle Mortar, Boss. Some Junker wired it up to be Held by a Battlemech and to fire home made 'Grenades'. 10 Shots.
content.content: 基本上这是一部载具迫击炮,老大.一些容克贵族把它和战斗机甲连接起来,可以发射自制的'手榴弹'.

content.original: The Hatchet is a melee attack weapon equipped on BattleMechs. While most 'Mechs are equipped with ranged weaponry, melee weaponry is also both feasible and useful due to increased damage potential (over a punch) and a lack of heat buildup.
content.prevOriginal: The Hatchet is a melee attack weapon equipped on BattleMechs. While most 'Mechs are equipped with ranged weaponry, melee weaponry is also both feasible and useful due to increased damage potential (over a punch) and a lack of heat buildup.
content.content: 短柄斧是装备在战斗机甲上的近战攻击武器.虽然大多数机甲装备了远程武器,但近战武器也是可行和有用的,因为增加了潜在的伤害(超过一次打击)和降低了热累积.

content.original: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.prevOriginal: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.content: 这是一把实体武器并且用起来就像是普通武器

content.original: The BattleMech Lance is a special melee weapon designed to pierce armor plating. Unlike the medieval weapon of the same name, the Lance is a long, thin spike that juts out from a 'Mech's arm; it is not a large spear-like weapon carried in the hand. In combat the Lance pierces the armor plating of an enemy unit, possibly damaging or destroying internal systems.
content.prevOriginal: The BattleMech Lance is a special melee weapon designed to pierce armor plating. Unlike the medieval weapon of the same name, the Lance is a long, thin spike that juts out from a 'Mech's arm; it is not a large spear-like weapon carried in the hand. In combat the Lance pierces the armor plating of an enemy unit, possibly damaging or destroying internal systems.
content.content: 战斗机甲长矛是一种特殊的近战武器,旨在刺穿装甲层.与同名的中世纪武器不同,长矛是一个长而细的尖刺,从机甲的手臂上伸出;它不是拿在手里的大型长矛状武器.在战斗中,长矛刺穿敌方单位的装甲,可能会破坏或摧毁内部系统.

content.content: 战斗机甲长矛是一种特殊的近战武器,旨在刺穿装甲层.与同名的中世纪武器不同,长矛是一个长而细的尖刺,从机甲的手臂上伸出;它不是拿在手里的大型长矛状武器.在战斗中,长矛刺穿敌方单位的装甲,可能会破坏或摧毁内部系统.

In combat the Lance pierces the armor plating of an enemy unit, possibly damaging or destroying internal systems.

content.original: While initially little more than bulked out hatchets that traded a cutting edge for crushing ability when they first appeared in the Solaris Games, has the weapon evolved into the heavier and distinctive definitive model. Despite finally reaching a production grade standard, the unwieldy and unbalanced nature of the mace compared to the hatchet or sword has made them rarely seen in general military 'Mech designs.

content.original: An Anti-Personnel Pod (A-Pod) is a piece of equipment designed specifically for 'Mechs. When detonated, effectively fill an area 15 meters in diameter with deadly shrapnel. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: An Anti-Personnel Pod (A-Pod) is a piece of equipment designed specifically for 'Mechs. When detonated, effectively fill an area 15 meters in diameter with deadly shrapnel. VOLATILE!
content.content: 人员杀伤吊舱(-Pod)一种专门为机甲设计的设备.引爆时,用致命的弹片有效地填满直径15米的区域.不稳定!

content.original: Anti-Battle Armor Pod or B-Pod functions like an Anti-Personnel Pod except that it is designed to blast through the armor of battle suits. It does this by using explosive bomblets instead of shrapnel. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Anti-Battle Armor Pod or B-Pod functions like an Anti-Personnel Pod except that it is designed to blast through the armor of battle suits. It does this by using explosive bomblets instead of shrapnel. VOLATILE!
content.content: 反战斗装甲吊舱或B-吊舱的功能类似于人员杀伤吊舱,只是它被设计成可以炸穿战斗服的装甲.它是通过使用爆炸性小炸弹而不是弹片来做到这一点的.不稳定!

content.original: The M-Pod is based on the A-Pod and B-Pod, but uses larger explosives and a more directional blast to damage hard targets. Designed by engineers in the Solaris games, the M-Pod is essentially a modified canister of LB-X autocannon ammunition. When activated it sprays targets with a mixture of shrapnel and 'Mech sized shotgun pellets. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: The M-Pod is based on the A-Pod and B-Pod, but uses larger explosives and a more directional blast to damage hard targets. Designed by engineers in the Solaris games, the M-Pod is essentially a modified canister of LB-X autocannon ammunition. When activated it sprays targets with a mixture of shrapnel and 'Mech sized shotgun pellets. VOLATILE!
content.content: M吊舱是基于A吊舱和B吊舱的,但使用更大的炸药和定向的爆炸来破坏更硬的目标.由工程师在索拉里斯游戏中设计,M吊舱本质上是一个改装的LB-X自动加农炮弹药罐.当被激活时,它用弹片和机甲猎枪弹丸大小的的混合喷向目标.不稳定!

content.original: Introduced in the late 31st Century on Solaris VII, the Combat Shield is a movable piece of armor that can be mounted on BattleMechs. The shield was first introduced as a method to add protection for a MechWarrior fighting in the arenas of Solaris. Shields are primary defensive equipment used to protect a 'Mech from Weapons fire and some forms of physical attacks. Equipping more than 1 wont yield additional effects, does not stack with other combat shields.
content.prevOriginal: Introduced in the late 31st Century on Solaris VII, the Combat Shield is a movable piece of armor that can be mounted on BattleMechs. The shield was first introduced as a method to add protection for a MechWarrior fighting in the arenas of Solaris. Shields are primary defensive equipment used to protect a 'Mech from Weapons fire and some forms of physical attacks. Equipping more than 1 wont yield additional effects, does not stack with other combat shields.
content.content: 战斗盾牌于31世纪晚期在索拉里斯VII上推出,是一种可移动的装甲,可以安装在战斗机甲上.盾牌最初是作为一种在索拉里斯竞技场上战斗的机甲战士增加保护的方法引入的.盾牌是主要的防御设备,用来保护机甲免受武器、火力和某些形式的物理攻击.装备超过一个时不会产生额外效果,不能与其他战斗盾牌叠加.

content.original: Provides increased Evasive bonus and reduced Visibility.
content.prevOriginal: Provides increased Evasive bonus and reduced Visibility.
content.content: 增加闪避加成并且降低可见度.

content.original: Active Null Signature Systems reduce visibility and grant Bulwark.
content.prevOriginal: Active Null Signature Systems reduce visibility and grant Bulwark.
content.content: 激活零信号系统降低了可见性并增强了防御

content.original: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.prevOriginal: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.content: 该单位从移动中获得额外的闪避(直到最大值).

content.original: This appears to be a bog standard Bulldozer Blade that some yokel decided to heavily reinforce. Looks like they even added some targeting lasers and scanners to it so they could line up their charges better without the blade interfering with their sighting. Use at your own risk, Boss.

content.content: 这似乎一个标准的推土机铲,一些乡巴佬决定将它大力加强.看起来他们甚至加装一些瞄准激光和扫描仪,这样他们可以在不干扰视线的情况下更好的进行充能.使用它有风险,老板.

content.original: A Basic IFF (Identify Friend/Foe) Jamming unit that prevents enemy to ascertain a units allegiance replacing a cockpits sensor systems. Creates a low level ECM field but cannot enable Stealth. Can be used additionally to ECM Equipment.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic IFF (Identify Friend/Foe) Jamming unit that prevents enemy to ascertain a units allegiance replacing a cockpits sensor systems. Creates a low level ECM field but cannot enable Stealth. Can be used additionally to ECM Equipment.
content.content: 一种基本的敌我识别(识别敌我)干扰装置,防止敌人确定一个单位的阵营,替代驾驶舱的传感器系统.创建低级别ECM场,但不能启用隐身.可不依靠ECM装备独立使用.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM护罩单元的效果

content.original: A Night Vision Module, allowing a mech to fight during bad Light conditions as if it were Daylight.
content.prevOriginal: A Night Vision Module, allowing a mech to fight during bad Light conditions as if it were Daylight.
content.content: 一个夜视模块,允许机甲在恶劣的光线条件下战斗,就像白天一样.

content.original: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.prevOriginal: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.content: 让战斗机甲用上完美的热视觉需要大量的时间和奉献,光学320套件成功地制造了一些惊人的结果.该模块于2950年首次发布,允许机甲获得有限的热视野,同时通过为热成像单元添加非常重的屏蔽来消除来自机甲武器系统和操作反作用和干扰.

content.original: The Sword is a melee attack weapon developed in 3058 by the Draconis Combine as an 'honorable' alternative to the 'crude' Lyran Hatchet, the Sword inflicts almost as much damage as a Hatchet and offers a better hit probability due to its exceptional balance.
content.prevOriginal: The Sword is a melee attack weapon developed in 3058 by the Draconis Combine as an 'honorable' alternative to the 'crude' Lyran Hatchet, the Sword inflicts almost as much damage as a Hatchet and offers a better hit probability due to its exceptional balance.
content.content: 剑是一种近战攻击武器,由天龙联合体开发于3058年,作为'粗糙'的天琴座斧头的'光荣'替代品,剑几乎可以造成和斧头一样多的伤害,并拥有更好的命中率,因为它非凡的平衡性.

content.original: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.prevOriginal: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.content: 这是一把实体武器并且用起来就像是普通武器

content.content: 剑是一种近战攻击武器,由天龙联合体开发于3058年,作为'粗糙'的天琴座斧头的'光荣'替代品,剑几乎可以造成和斧头一样多的伤害,并拥有更好的命中率,因为它非凡的平衡性.

content.original: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.prevOriginal: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.content: 这是一把实体武器并且用起来就像是普通武器

content.original: A small BattleMech VibroBlade inflicting alot of damage but generates heat.
content.prevOriginal: A small BattleMech VibroBlade inflicting alot of damage but generates heat.
content.content: 一种小型战斗机甲振动刀,能够造成大量伤害,但会产生热量.
